basic_information.scholarship_name: Elvis and Wildred Rhodes Endowed Scholarship for Arts Education

description: This endowment was established in 2015 by Sue Harl in memory of her parents, Elvis and Wildred Rhodes. Eligibility Arts education major Cumulative GPA 3.0+ Junior or senior Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Sophomore   or SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Sophomore   or SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major is Art Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Art Education
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major is Art Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Art Education

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
